      • collectClassesRecursively

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> collectClassesRecursively​(java.io.File entryPoint,
                                                                                                    java.nio.file.Path inputProject,
                                                                                                    java.nio.file.Path mavenRepo,
                                                                                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> result)
        Iterates recursively over all java files from an entry point. Creates the classloader from each file and collects and counts all contained classes
        Parameters:
        entryPoint - Directory as entrypoint
        inputProject - Input project where the input file is located
        mavenRepo - Path of the maven repository. Necessary to load the dependencies of the project
        result - HashMap with class names as key and number of occurrences
        Returns:
        HashMap with package names as key and number of occurrences

      • collectDependenciesRecursively

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> collectDependenciesRecursively​(java.io.File entryPoint,
                                                                              java.nio.file.Path inputProject,
                                                                              java.nio.file.Path mavenRepo,
                                                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> result)
        Iterates recursively over all java files from an entry point and collects all dependencies of the project
        Parameters:
        entryPoint - Directory as entrypoint
        inputProject - Input project where the input file is located
        mavenRepo - Path of the maven repository. Necessary to load the dependencies of the project
        result - List of all dependencies of the project
        Returns:
        List of all dependencies of the project

      • collectPackagesRecursively

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> collectPackagesRecursively​(java.io.File entryPoint,
                                                                                                     java.nio.file.Path inputProject,
                                                                                                     java.nio.file.Path mavenRepo,
                                                                                                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> result)
        Collect and count all packages recursively across all Java files from an entry point
        Parameters:
        entryPoint - Directory as entrypoint
        inputProject - Input project where the input file is located
        mavenRepo - Path of the maven repository. Necessary to load the dependencies of the project
        result - HashMap with package names as key and number of occurrences
        Returns:
        HashMap with package names as key and number of occurrences

      • collectImportsRecursively

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> collectImportsRecursively​(java.io.File entryPoint,
                                                                                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> results)
        Collect and count all import statements recursively across all java files from an entrypoint
        Parameters:
        entryPoint - Directory as entrypoint
        results - HashMap with import statement as key and number of occurrences
        Returns:
        HashMap with import statement as key and number of occurrences

      • findAllClassesUsingClassLoader

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> findAllClassesUsingClassLoader​(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                                                             java.lang.String packageName)
        Loads all resources of a classloader and returns a list of the contained classes
        Parameters:
        classLoader - Classloader in which to search for classes
        packageName - Package name to generate full qualified names
        Returns:
        All classes in the given classloader

      • getJavaContext

        public static net.sf.mmm.code.impl.java.JavaContext getJavaContext​(java.nio.file.Path inputFile,
                                                                   java.nio.file.Path inputProject,
                                                                   java.nio.file.Path mavenRepo)
        Tries to get the Java context by creating a new class loader of the input project that is able to load the input file.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - File for which the context is created
        inputProject - Input project where the input file is located. Necessary to build the classpath from the input file
        mavenRepo - Path of the maven repository. Necessary to load the dependencies of the project
        Returns:
        Java context created from the input project

      • getFQN

        public static java.lang.String getFQN​(java.nio.file.Path inputFile)
        This method is traversing parent folders until it reaches java folder in order to get the FQN
        Parameters:
        inputFile - Java input file to retrieve FQN (Full Qualified Name)
        Returns:
        qualified name with full package
